title: Safe Houses in Tamaulipas
name: Safe Houses in Tamaulipas
description: This data presents safe houses in Tamaulipas, Mexico.

properties.basictitle: Organized Criminals Clash with Mexican Army Personnel in Reynosa
properties.bid: 12/03/2011: On Saturday night at 0040 in Colonia Aztlan, Reynosa, Tamaulipas, Mexico, a four-hour confrontation between Mexican army personnel and organized crime members resulted in the partial destruction of a criminal safe house and two arrests. The first confrontation began with three large explosions, and then sporadic gunfire eruped until 0430. No casualties were reported. No group claimed responsibility.
